motorcycles.description: All variants of the Honda Africa Twin (CRF1000) from 2016 to 2019.
motorcycles.name: Honda Africa Twin 2016 - 2019

tasks.name: Throttle operation
tasks.notes:
With the engine off, check that the throttle rotates smoothly from fully closed to fully open.
If the throttle does not move smoothly, close automatically, have the motorcycle inspected by your dealer.

tasks.name: Air cleaner
tasks.notes:
The air filter cannot be cleaned without degrading its performance. If the filter becomes dirty, replace it with a new one.
Service more frequently when riding in unusually wet or dusty areas.

tasks.name: Crankcase breather
tasks.notes: Service more frequently when riding in rain or at full throttle.

tasks.name: Spark plugs
tasks.notes:
Inspect (clean, adjust, lubricate, or replace if necessary) every 25600 km / 16000 miles.
Replace every 51200 km / 32000 miles.
Standard spark plug: NGK SILMAR8A9S
Spark plug gap: 0.03 - 0.04 in (0.8 - 0.9 mm)

tasks.description: Replace the engine oil and filter.
tasks.name: Engine oil
tasks.notes:
Replace the filter at the inital oil change and then at every other oil change.
Use SAE 10W-30 with classification SG or higher. JASO T 903 standard: MA. Do not use resource conserving or energy conserving oil.

tasks.description: Replace the clutch oil filter (if equipped).
tasks.name: Clutch oil filter

tasks.description: Inspect the secondary air supply system.
tasks.name: Secondary air supply system

tasks.description: Inspect the evaporative emission control system.
tasks.name: Evaporative emission system

tasks.description: Inspect and lubricate the drive chain.
tasks.name: Drive chain
tasks.notes: Service more frequently when riding off-road.

tasks.description: Inspect the clutch lever freeplay (if equipped).
tasks.name: Clutch system
tasks.notes: Inpect and adjust the clutch lever freeplay at 3/8 - 13/16 in(10 - 20 mm). Check the clutch cable for any sign of wear.

tasks.description: Inspect and tighten the nuts, bolts, and fasteners.
tasks.name: Nuts, bolts, fasteners
tasks.notes: Service more frequently when riding off-road.

tasks.name: Wheels / Tires
tasks.notes: Service more frequently when riding off-road.

motorcycles.description: All variants of the KTM 790 Adventure from 2019 to 2020.
motorcycles.name: KTM 790 Adventure 2019 - 2020

tasks.description: Read out the trouble code memory using the KTM diagnostics tool.
tasks.name: Trouble code memory

tasks.description: Check that the electrical system is functionning properly.
tasks.name: Electrical system

tasks.description: Change the engine oil and the oil filter, clean the oil screens.
tasks.name: Engine oil
tasks.notes:
Use SAE 10W/50, JASO T903 MA2. Fully synthetic oil.
Recommended: MOTOREX ® Power Synt 4T

tasks.description: Check the front and rear brake linings, and the discs,.
tasks.name: Brake linings and discs
tasks.notes:
Check the front brake linings.
Check the rear brake linings.
Check brake discs.

tasks.description: Check the brake lines for damage and leakage.
tasks.name: Brake lines
Brake fluid
tasks.notes:
Use DOT 4 or DOT 5.1.
Recommended: 
- Castrol REACT PERFORMANCE DOT 4
- MOTOREX ® Brake Fluid DOT 5.1

tasks.description: Check the free travel of the clutch lever.
tasks.name: Clutch level

tasks.description: Check the free travel of the brake lever.
tasks.name: Brake lever

tasks.description: Check the shock absorber and forks for leaks.
tasks.name: Shock absorber and forks
tasks.notes: Perform service as needed and depending on how the vehicle is used.

tasks.description: Check the dust boots of the fork legs.
tasks.name: Dust boots

tasks.description: Check the steering head bearing play.
tasks.name: Steering head bearing play

tasks.description: Check the tire condition and pressure.
tasks.name: Tires

tasks.description: Check the chain, rear sprocket, engine sprocket, and chain guide.
tasks.name: Chain and sprockets
Spark plugs
tasks.notes:
Spark plugs: NGK LMAR9AI‐10
Electrode gap: 1.0 mm (0.039 in)

tasks.description: Check the coolant fill level and antifreeze.
tasks.name: Coolant and antifreeze

tasks.description: Check the cables for damage and for routing without kinks.
tasks.name: Cables

tasks.description: Change the air filter and clean the air filter box.
tasks.name: Air filter

tasks.description: Check that the radiator fan is functionning properly.
tasks.name: Radiator fan

tasks.description: Check the vehicle is roadworthy and take a test ride.
tasks.name: Final check

tasks.description: Read out the error memory after the test ride using the KTM dignostics tool.
tasks.name: Error memory

tasks.description: Make a service entry in KTM Dealers.net
tasks.name: Service entry

tasks.description: Check/clean the oil nozzle for clutch lubrication.
tasks.name: Oil nozzle

tasks.description: Check the fork bearing for play.
tasks.name: Fork bearing

tasks.description: Check the wheel bearing for play.
tasks.name: Wheel bearing

tasks.description: Check all the hoses and sleeves for cracking, leaks, and incorrect routing.
tasks.name: Hoses
tasks.notes: e.g. fuel, cooling, bleeder, drainage, etc.

tasks.description: Grease all moving parts and check for smooth operation.
tasks.name: Grease
tasks.notes: e.g., side stand, hand lever, chain, ...

tasks.description: Check the tightness of the safety-relevant screws and nuts which are easily accessible.
tasks.name: Screws and nuts

motorcycles.description: All variants of the Suzuki DR650 from 1996 to now.
motorcycles.name: Suzuki DR650 1996 -

tasks.description: Measure and adjust the valve clearance.
tasks.name: Valve clearance

tasks.description: Clean and oil the air filter.
tasks.name: Air cleaner element
tasks.notes:
Clean with soapy water. Oil using engine oil. Replace air filter if necessary.
Clean air filter drain cap.

tasks.name: Spark plugs
tasks.notes:
Inspect the spark plugs and replace if necessary. Spark plug gap: 0.7 - 0.8 mm (0.028 - 0.031 in)
Recommended replacement 24 months/12000km.
Standard spark plugs NGK CR10E / Denso U31ESR-N.
If the plugs are wet or very dark, use NGK CR9E / Denso U27ESR-N

tasks.name: Idle speed
tasks.notes: Warm engine and adjust to 1400-1600 r/min.

tasks.name: Fuel hose
tasks.notes: Replace every 4 years.

tasks.name: Clutch adjustment
tasks.notes: The play of the clutch lever should be 10 - 15 mm (0.4 - 0.6 in) measured at the clutch lever end.

tasks.description: Replace the engine oil and filter.
tasks.name: Engine oil
tasks.notes:
Use SAE 10W-40 oil.
API: SG, SH, SJ, or SL. JASO: MA.
Do not use "Energy Conserving" oil.
The oil filter must be changed with every other oil change (12000 km / 7500 miles or 24 months)

tasks.name: Drive chain
tasks.notes:
Clean and lubricate the drive chain every 1000 km / 600 miles.
Inspect and adjust the chain every 6000 km / 4000 miles, or 12 months.

The slack of the drive chain should be measured at the middle point between the chain buffer and the rear sprocket. The slack should be 30 - 45 mm (1.2 - 1.8 in.).
Rear axle nut tightening torque: 110 N⋅m (79.5 lbf-ft).

tasks.name: Brakes
tasks.notes:
Inspect the fluid level (front and back).
Inspect the brake system and hoses for signs of fluid leakage.
The brake lever and pedal should have proper stroke and be firm at all times.
Check the wear of the disc brake pads.

tasks.name: Brakes
tasks.notes:
Inspect the fluid level (front and back).
Inspect the brake system and hoses for signs of fluid leakage.
The brake lever and pedal should have proper stroke and be firm at all times.
Check the wear of the disc brake pads.

tasks.name: Replace brake fluid
tasks.notes: Clean the filler cap before removing. Use only DOT4 brake fluid from a sealed container.

tasks.name: Steering
tasks.notes: Inspect and clean, adjust, replace or lubricate as necessary.

tasks.description: Inspect and clean the front forks.
tasks.name: Front fork
tasks.notes: Inspect and clean, adjust, replace or lubricate as necessary.

tasks.description: Inspect and clean the rear suspension.
tasks.name: Rear suspension
tasks.notes: Inspect and clean, adjust, replace or lubricate as necessary.

tasks.description: Inspect the tires and adjust pressure.
tasks.name: Tires
tasks.notes: Inspect and clean, adjust, replace or lubricate as necessary.

tasks.description: Tighten the exhaust and muffler bolts.
tasks.name: Exhaust pipe and muffler bolts

tasks.description: Tighten the chassis nuts and bolts.
tasks.name: Chassis nuts and bolts

motorcycles.description: The S/SM variants of the Suzuki DRZ400 from 2001 to now.
motorcycles.name: Suzuki DRZ400 S/SM 2001 -

tasks.description: Clean and oil the air filter.
tasks.name: Air cleaner element
tasks.notes: Inspect the air cleaner element for tears. Clean with nonflammable cleaning solvent. Oil using motor oil. Replace air filter every 18000 km / 11000 miles.

tasks.description: Tighten the exhaust pipe nut and bolt and muffler nut and bolts.
tasks.name: Exhaust pipe and muffler bolts
Tappet clearance
tasks.notes:
Tappet clearance when cold:
IN: 0.10 - 0.20 mm (0.0039 - 0.0079 in)
EX: 0.20 - 0.30 mm (0.0079 - 0.0118 in)

tasks.name: Spark plugs
tasks.notes:
Inspect the spark plugs and replace if necessary.
Spark plug gap: 0.7 - 0.8 mm (0.028 - 0.031 in)
Recommended replacement 12 months / 12000km / 7500 miles.
Standard spark plugs: NGK CR8E / Denso U24ESR-N.
Cold type: NGK CR9E / Denso U27ESR-N.
Hot type: NGK CR7E / Denso U22ESR-N

tasks.name: Fuel hose
tasks.notes: Replace every 4 years.

tasks.name: Engine oil
tasks.notes:
Use SAE 10W-40 oil.
API: SG, SH, SJ, or SL. JASO: MA.
Do not use "Energy Conserving" oil.
The oil filter must be changed initially after 1 month or 1000 km / 600 miles. Then every 18 months or 18000 km / 11000 miles.

tasks.name: Drive chain
tasks.notes:
Clean and lubricate the drive chain every 1000 km / 600 miles.
Inspect and adjust the chain every 6000 km / 4000 miles, or 6 months.

Adjust the slack to 40 - 50 mm (1.6 - 2.0 in.).
20-pitch max length: 319.4 mm (12.57 in).

tasks.name: Brake fluid
tasks.notes: Replace every 2 years.

tasks.name: Brake hoses
tasks.notes: Replace every 4 years.

tasks.description: Inspect the Evaporative emission control system (if equipped).
tasks.name: Evaporative emission control
tasks.notes: Replace vapor hoses every 4 years.

tasks.description: Inspect the the PAIR (air supply) system (if equipped).
tasks.name: PAIR (air supply) system

tasks.description: Tighten the chassis nuts and bolts.
tasks.name: Chassis nuts and bolts

motorcycles.description: Periodic Maintenance from the XTZ12AESL Owner's Manual 2020
motorcycles.name: Yamaha Super Ténéré 700 2020

tasks.description: Check fuel hoses for cracks or damage. Replace if necessary.
tasks.name: Fuel Line

tasks.description: Check condition. Adjust gap and clean.
tasks.name: Spark Plugs
Replace spark plugs

tasks.description: Check and adjust valve clearance when engine is cold.
tasks.name: Valve Clearance

tasks.description: Check breather hose for cracks or damage. Replace is necessary.
tasks.name: Crankcase Breather System

tasks.description: Check for leakage. Tighten if necessary. Replace gasket if necessary.
tasks.name: Exhaust  System

tasks.description: Perform dynamic inspection using Yamaha diagnostic tool. Check the error codes.
tasks.name: Diagnostic System Check

tasks.description: Check operation, fluid level and for fluid leakage. Correct if necessary.
tasks.name: Clutch

tasks.description: Check operation, fluid level and for fluid leakage. Replace brake pads if necessary.
tasks.name: Front brake

tasks.description: Check operation, fluid level and for fluid leakage. Replace brake pads if necessary.
tasks.name: Rear brake

tasks.description: Check for cracks or damage. Check for correct routing and clamping.
tasks.name: Brake hoses

tasks.description: Check rim runout and spokes for damage. Tighten all spokes.
tasks.name: Wheels

tasks.description: Check tread depth and for damage. Replace if necessary. Check air pressure. Correct if necessary.
tasks.name: Tires

tasks.description: Check bearings for smooth operation. Replace if necessary.
tasks.name: Wheel bearings

tasks.description: Check operation and for excessive play.
tasks.name: Swingarm pivot bearings

tasks.description: Check all chassis fitting and fasteners. Correct if necessary.
tasks.name: Chassis fasteners

tasks.description: Check operation. Apply lithium-soap-based grease lightly.
tasks.name: Centerstand / sidestand pivots

tasks.description: Check operation and replace if necessary.
tasks.name: Sidestand switch

tasks.description: Check operation and for oil leakage. Replace if necessary.
tasks.name: Front fork
Change engine oil
tasks.notes:
- Recommended brand: Yamalube
- SAE viscosity grades: 10W-40, 10W-50, 15W-40, 20W-40 or 20W-50
- Recommended engine oil grade: API service SG type or higher, JASO standard MA

Engine oil quantity:
- Oil change: 3.10 L (3.28 US qt, 2.73 Imp.qt)
- With oil filter removal: 3.40 L (3.59 US qt, 2.99 Imp.qt)

tasks.description: Check coolant level and vehicle for coolant leakage.
tasks.name: Cooling system
tasks.notes:
- Coolant reservoir (up to the maximum level mark): 0.26 L (0.27 US qt, 0.23 Imp.qt)
- Radiator (including all routes): 1.83 L (1.93 US qt, 1.61 Imp.qt)

tasks.name: Change cooling system
tasks.notes:
- Coolant reservoir (up to the maximum level mark): 0.26 L (0.27 US qt, 0.23 Imp.qt)
- Radiator (including all routes): 1.83 L (1.93 US qt, 1.61 Imp.qt

tasks.description: Check oil level and for oil leakage.
tasks.name: Final gear oil
tasks.notes:
At 24 000, change. 

- Type: Yamaha genuine shaft drive gear oil SAE, 80W-90 API GL-5 or SAE 80 API GL-4, Hypoid gear oil
- Quantity: 0.20 L (0.21 US qt, 0.18 Imp.qt)

tasks.name: Change final gear oil
tasks.notes:
- Type: Yamaha genuine shaft drive gear oil SAE, 80W-90 API GL-5 or SAE 80 API GL-4, Hypoid gear oil
- Quantity: 0.20 L (0.21 US qt, 0.18 Imp.qt)

tasks.description: Check operation, see Notes for more.
tasks.name: Throttle grip
tasks.notes:
• Check throttle grip free play, and adjust if necessary.
• Lubricate cable and grip housing.
• Lubricate grip warmer wire and wire housing.
